definition: to freeze to death/to die off in winter
to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly

sentences.english: If you had stayed out all night in the snow,you might have frozen to death.
sentences.chinese: 你要是在外面的雪地裏呆上一晚準會凍死。

sentences.english: Late frosts are ruination for the garden.
sentences.chinese: 晚霜能凍死園中的植物。

sentences.english: At first, it looked as if Otzi had frozen to death in a snowstorm in the Alps.
sentences.chinese: 初看起來奧茲似乎凍死於阿爾卑斯山的雪暴。

sentences.english: Heavy snow wreaks havoc in northwest China, destroying livestock and blocking roads. Michaela Cabrera reports.
sentences.chinese: 大雪肆虐中國西北部，凍死大量牲畜，阻塞了道路。

sentences.english: Half of the vegetable freeze out in the sudden cold.
sentences.chinese: 一半的蔬菜在突如其來的寒涼中凍死了。

sentences.english: Put another coat on, you'll freeze to death out there.
sentences.chinese: 再穿上一件外衣吧，你在外面會凍死的。

sentences.english: Many grass-seed was frozen to death in the winter.
sentences.chinese: 許多草籽在冬天凍死了。

sentences.english: As a viewer, you were shut inside the om of an absolute soundless fridge, almost freezing to death.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個觀衆，你被關在無聲的冰箱裏面幾乎凍死。

sentences.english: The little match girl was frozen to death.
sentences.chinese: 賣火柴的小女孩給凍死了。

sentences.english: I said, "All right but put the fire on – it's mighty cold."
sentences.chinese: 我說，“好吧，但把火點上，凍死了。”

sentences.english: Half the fruit crop was frozen out in the sudden severe autumn.
sentences.chinese: 有一半的果樹在這突如其來的嚴寒的秋季凍死了。

sentences.english: Late frosts areruination for the garden.
sentences.chinese: 晚霜能凍死園中的植物。

sentences.english: After checking, they thought the cat must have died in the cold luggage compartment.
sentences.chinese: 經過檢查，他們想一定是行李艙裏太冷，把貓凍死了。

sentences.english: Just 2 minutes off its webbed perch and the chick will freeze to death.
sentences.chinese: 只要離開溫暖腳窩兩分鐘，就足以凍死企鵝寶寶。

sentences.english: Chances are that the people who go overboard will die- from drowning, shark attack, or the cold.
sentences.chinese: 跳下去的人能夠溺死，被鯊魚襲擊或許凍死。

definition: to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly
to starve to death/to be very hungry
air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
quilt wrapped around the body as a tube (traditional bedding)/(contemporary) bedding/quilt/blankets/cover/bed
to run around all over the place
